qr.title: Connect with QR Code
qr.description: Scan the QR code in the NexusViewPanel app with your phone's camera, then paste the entire text string (it starts with 'http://...') into the field below.

manual.title: Connect Manually
manual.description: Enter the connection details for your NexusViewPanel device.

name.title: Name Your Device
name.description: Set a friendly name and the polling intervals for this device.

error.invalid_auth: Authentication failed. Please check your API Token.
error.invalid_qr: Invalid string format. It should look like 'http://<ip>:<port>/swagger?api_token=<token>'
